summary:
-DAWNGUARD REQUIRED-
A teleport to bring you to Valerica\'s Lab, right at the entrance to Soul Cairn.
descriptionHtml:
--REQUIRES DAWNGUARD-- ...obviously.

Ever wanted to return to Soul Cairn quickly and easily? Or tried to return through the ruins and got mauled by respawned Death Hounds? Well, here\'s a spell for you!

At the low low price of nothing, you can return to the entrance of Soul Cairn - right at the top of the steps. Now you can go and get those irritating pages for that guy\'s book, or the undead horse!

To get it : in the console type \"player.addspell 4D002F9B\"
Or \"help teleport 4\" and add the code you see!

INSTALLATION
1) Get Winrar/7zip
2) Open file. (Download it first if you like :D)
3) Extract to root Skyrim directory (Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim)
4) Activate .esp in NMM or other.
5) Profit.
author: BeefPie
